name: Software Identification (SWID) Tag
description: PURL type for ISO-IEC 19770-2 Software Identification (SWID) tags, uniquely identifying software products.

namespace.description: Optional namespace containing the software creator's name (required if specified) and an optional registration ID (regid) as a second segment. A maximum of two segments are supported.

qualifiers.name: tag_id
qualifiers.description: The tagId as defined in the SWID SoftwareIdentity element. GUIDs must be lowercase. If not a GUID, case-aware but case-insensitive.

qualifiers.name: tag_version
qualifiers.description: The tagVersion as defined in the SWID SoftwareIdentity element. Must be an integer. Defaults to 0 if not specified.

qualifiers.name: patch
qualifiers.description: Indicates whether the SWID tag corresponds to a patch. Defaults to false if not specified.

qualifiers.name: tag_creator_name
qualifiers.description: The entity that created the SWID tag, if different from the software creator.

qualifiers.name: tag_creator_regid
qualifiers.description: The registration ID (regid) of the entity that created the SWID tag, if different from the software creator.

repository.description: SWID PURLs do not reference a package repository.
